text: Iñaki Godoy Jasso (born 25 August 2003) is a Mexican actor. He is known for his role as Juan Ruiz in The Imperfects (2022) and Monkey D. Luffy in Netflix's live version of One Piece (2023). ==References== Category:2003 births Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Living people Category:Mexican television actors
title: Iñaki Godoy
